introduction: Nothing cements a relationship like a shared hobby. Jasiek and Olga photograph waterfalls, while Hela and Zuza take cheeky portraits of the Pope (that's a quote, Your Honor!). Together, the four friends enjoy cycling trips, admiring the views, bathing in streams, and passing around a joint. It sounds like the perfect recipe for summer lightheartedness—until the instincts suppressed by relationship routines awaken, reminding them that youth can be painfully egocentric and capricious.
